name: In the Best of Worlds
description:
You're a Swedish student who gets a job as Onboard service personnel on a passenger train. You've got the job but now you have to find a place to stay. Luckily for you, the Helpful AI in your handy app called LastApp has your back. Experience a short game that will give you some insight into what it's like making your way in a socialist society.

You only need to point and click the left mouse button to move or pick a response in a conversation.

This is a short game for a school project. I would appreciate feedback :) Feedback form link
